name: Dungeon&Destruction
description:
The Game:

After being trapped in the wizard's dungeon, finally, you found a way to escape. As a small destructive vessel of doom, accompanied by magical skulls, your job is to incite as much chaos as you can and destroy the dungeon's columns. 

Instructions:

- Relying on the mechanics and the well-known Tetris and Helicopter games, the player must fit perfectly between the columns in order to destroy them and earn score points.

- The player should avoid clashing with the columns. Each skull clashing with columns results in health loss. One-eyes monster clashing with the columns results in a total loss.

Made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and design.
